Package de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice

Interface HospitalStay

All Superinterfaces:
PersistentObject
public interface HospitalStay extends PersistentObject
The interface HospitalStay describes a stay in a hospital. Every stay is characterized by the following attributes:
  • Patient: A Patient object associated with a HospitalStay.
  • AdmissionDate: The date a patient enters a hospital for treatment.
  • DischargeDate: The date a patient leaves a hospital.
  • Ward: The ward on which the stay takes place.

  • Method Details

    • getAdmissionDate

      Date getAdmissionDate()
      Returns:
      May return null.

    • setAdmissionDate

      void setAdmissionDate(Date date)
      Parameters:
      date - An admission date is only valid if it is a date before the discharge date. It must not be null.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - Thrown if a given parameter value is invalid.

    • getDischargeDate

      Date getDischargeDate()
      Returns:
      The discharge date or null if it has not been set.

    • setDischargeDate

      void setDischargeDate(Date date)
      Parameters:
      date - A discharge date is only valid if it is a date after the admission date or null.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - Thrown if a given parameter value is invalid.

    • getWard

      Ward getWard()
      Returns:
      An associated Ward object.
      Throws:
      FetchException - Thrown if an error occurred while fetching a Ward object.

    • setWard

      void setWard(Ward ward)
      Parameters:
      ward - must not be null.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - Thrown if a given parameter value is invalid.

    • getPatient

      Patient getPatient()
      Returns:
      An associated Patient object (should not be null).
      Throws:
      FetchException - Thrown if an error occurred while fetching a Patient object.
